content.rendered:
We have recently won the Deloitte Technology Fast 50 Award in the main category and we’re looking for new colleagues to help us go further. Take the opportunity to take part in the rapidly growing startup FTMO.com. As a senior developer, you will be responsible for overseeing the development of new major features and the adoption of new technologies and processes. You will work with other team members to improve the quality of the codebase, spend your time doing code reviews, and help more junior developers grow and maintain our enterprise application.

What will be your agenda?

  • Office in Prague with home-office possibility
  • Developing internal back-office apps and new web applications for end users
  • Focus on backend development, previous experience with twig + bootstrap welcomed
  • Microservice infrastructure using cloud based infrastructure with Kubernetes
  • Active usage of technologies like Redis, Kafka, ElasticSearch, CI/CD, Kubernetes, Google Cloud, Nginx.

What are we expecting from you?

  • Docker
  • Git
  • PHP 8
  • PHP Slim (or Laravel, Symfony)
  • PHPUnit
  • REST api creation
  • SQL query optimization
  • Kubernetes, CI/CD
  • ELK, Kibana

And why work for us?

  • You will be working for a fast-growing start-up/fintech, where you will find 150+ motivated people. We’re rather friends than colleagues and we share the same goals.
  • We encourage self-realisation, we’re flexible and open to new ideas. Each of us can influence the project while working on ourselves and move professionally forward.
  • Thanks our working pace, we can assure you that you won’t get bored with us.
  • We will train you on financial markets and all the other related topics so you know our business.
  • Working from home is not a problem (it always depends on the agreement), but we prefer to work in the office – Quadrio offices will make you feel like at home as well.
  • Free snacks and refreshments (both healthy and sweet) are available for everyone in the office.
  • We’ll offer you a Multisport card, feel free to join our FTMO Running club!
  • Providing appropriate HW goes without saying (laptop, 2 monitors, adjustable desk, ergonomic chair). We want to make sure you’ll feel comfortable in our Quadrio offices.
  • Meeting room for poker and board games. Or you can sing karaoke with us.

Did we catch your attention? Let us know!
Send us ➡️ your CV or LinkedIn profile and we’ll gladly meet you, regardless whether in person or online.
